code: import{configureStore}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';import productReducer from'./Product/productSlice.js';import cartReducer from'./Cart/cartSlice.js';import userReducer from'./User/userSlice.js';import orderReducer from'./Orders/orderSlice.js';export const store=configureStore({reducer:{product:productReducer,cart:cartReducer,user:userReducer,order:orderReducer}});
